name: Commercialista.com
tag_list: professionals, lead-generation, answers, consultancy, search-engine, geocoded, profiles, local, italy, accountant, tax, labour
overview: Commercialista.com is a 2.0 directory built to easily identify accounting professionals and tax consultants, and to get answers on tax releted topics in Italy (“commercialista” is the Italian word for “accountant” and “tax consultant”). The platform is both a marketing tool for professionals and a search/evaluation engine for users who need to hire a consultant. Albeit specific, the engine is actually a pilot-project for multiple vertical sites focused on the world of professionals. Vision is that all professionals should be online, findable, reachable and ready to fulfill the already existing demand. Company wants to revamp many sectors that haven’t experienced the digital revolution yet.
